address: High Street, Langholm, Dumfries and Galloway, DG13
description: End terraced cottage property located in Langholm. This property is a three bedroom property available at an amazing price. This property benefits from its quiet location but requires a full renovation making it the ideal purchase for an investor or developer eager for their next project. Once work is completed, this property has the potential to acheive in excess of £150,000 on the open market.
For any further information, please contact the Wilsons Auctions Property Department

Located in the area of Langholm, Dumfries this country house sits in a private position. The area provides frequent public bus services and a post office. Carlisle is only a 30-minute drive and has a wide range of amenities including schools, health and leisure facilities. The Dumfriesshire countryside is a popular tourism destination, particularly due to the close proximity to the English border. This rural property is perfectly suited for a holiday rental, with properties nearby achieving over £150 per night.
This property would look to achieve a rental income of around £725 PCM giving it an outstanding yield of over 17% if secured at the guide price of £50,000.
